plugin.name: Hypo71
plugin.description: This plugin allows the use of the traditional Hypo71PC locator with SeisComP3.

parameter.name: logFile
parameter.description: Temporary file used by Hypo71 to store calculation logs.

parameter.name: inputFile
parameter.description: Temporary file to write Hypo71 input data to.

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: Temporary output file to read Hypo71 location data from.

parameter.name: defaultControlFile
parameter.description: Hypo71 default profile. If no custom profile is specified, this profile will be used by the plugin when proceeding to a localization.

parameter.name: hypo71ScriptFile
parameter.description: Bash script executed when calling the Hypo71 locator plugin for locating the earthquake.

parameter.name: profiles
parameter.description: Hypo71 profile name. Multiples names may be set. They must be separated by comma. Each profile can have different velocity or parameters.

group.name: profile
group.description: Profiles containing the profile-specific velocity model and the Hypo71 parameters.

parameter.name: methodID
parameter.description: Profile's method. It is generally the locator's name (Hypo71).

parameter.name: fixStartDepthOnly
parameter.description: If the depth is requested to be fixed (e.g. by ticking the option in scolv) the plugin performs only one location starting at specified depth but with free depth evaluation. This option defines whether it should really fix the depth (false) or use this fixed depth only as starting point (true).

parameter.name: publicID
parameter.description: Custom patternID to use when generating origin publicID

parameter.name: useHypo71PatternID
parameter.description: Specifies if the given publicD should be used for generating origin publicID
